short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creates a simple shortcut to play the next netflix episode available. Just click "N" to go to the next one.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The easiest way to do it. This extension simulates a click on the "next episode" button via keyboard shortcut.
